data.title: Martina Navratilova
data.meta_description: Book Martina Navratilova Profile - Retired World #1 Tennis Player, International Tennis Hall of Famer, Gay Rights Activist & Author
data.text:
How do I book Martina Navratilova to speak at my event?

Our experienced booking agents have successfully helped clients around the world secure speakers like Martina Navratilova for speaking engagements, personal appearances, product endorsements, or corporate entertainment since 2002. Click the Check Schedule button above and complete the form on this page to check availability for Martina Navratilova, or call our office at 1.800.698.2536 to discuss your upcoming event. One of our experienced agents will be happy to help you get speaking fee information and check availability for Martina Navratilova or any other speaker of your choice.

How much does it cost to book Martina Navratilova for a speaking engagement?

Speaking fees for Martina Navratilova, or any other speakers and celebrities, are determined based on a number of factors and may change without notice. The estimated fees to book Martina Navratilova are $100,000 - $200,000 for live events and $100,000 - $200,000 for virtual events. For the most current speaking fee to hire Martina Navratilova, click the Check Schedule button above and complete the form on this page, or call our office at 1.800.698.2536 to speak directly with an experienced booking agent.

What topics does Martina Navratilova speak about?

Martina Navratilova is a keynote speaker and industry expert who speaks on a wide range of topics such as Diversity & Inclusion, Tennis, Health, Women's Rights, Sports Motivation, LGBTQ, Athlete, Entertainers, Empowerment, Social Activism, Overcoming Adversity, Peak Performance, Women's Health, Inspirational, Motivational, Women, Influential Women, Cancer, Sports, Cancer Survivor and Culture.

Where does Martina Navratilova travel from?

Martina Navratilova generally travels from Florida, USA and can be booked for (private) corporate events, personal appearances, keynote speeches, or other performances.

Who is the agent for Martina Navratilova?

AAE Speakers Bureau has successfully secured keynote speakers like Martina Navratilova for clients worldwide since 2002. As a full-service speaker booking agency, we have access to virtually any speaker or celebrity in the world. Our agents are happy and able to submit an offer to the speaker or celebrity of your choice, letting you benefit from our reputation and long-standing relationships in the industry. Please click the Check Schedule button above and complete the form on this page including the details of your event, or call our office at 1.800.698.2536, and one of our agents will assist you to book Martina Navratilova for your next private or corporate function.

What is a full-service speaker booking agency?

AAE Speakers Bureau is a full-service speaker booking agency, meaning we can completely manage the speaker’s or celebrity’s engagement with your organization from the time of booking your speaker through the event’s completion. We provide all of the services you need to host Martina Navratilova or any other speaker of your choice, including offer negotiation, contractual assistance, accounting and billing, and event speaker travel and logistics services. When you book a speaker with us, we manage the process of hosting a speaker for you as an extension of your team. Our goal is to give our clients peace of mind and a best-in-class service experience when booking a speaker with us.

Why is AAE Speakers Bureau different from other booking agencies?

If you’re looking for the best speaker recommendations, paired with a top-notch customer service experience, you’re in the right place. At AAE Speakers Bureau, we exclusively represent the interests of our clients - professional organizations, companies, universities, and associations. We intentionally do not represent the speakers we feature or book. That is so we can present our clients with the broadest and best performing set of speaker options in the market today, and we can make these recommendations without any obligation to promote a specific speaker over another. This is why when our agents suggest a speaker for your event, you can be assured that they are of the highest quality with a history of proven success with our other clients.
